content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 1 **description** one of my favorite lines is back with a lot of fun and squishy texture in the diana basket this design is worked from the bottom up after a row by row base in the round make sure to keep an eye on the turns so you don t miss out on the extra squishy texture and feel free to add row to give it more height so that next time you can get even more yarn tucked in there yarn baskets are the best for carrying new projects in trust me i do it smiley the sample in the photos was made in hue + me by lion brand yarn in the color rose water 2 you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2022 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/free-diana-basket-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/3ivu3
